Package ca.on.oicr.gsi.shesmu.compiler.definitions

Interface ActionParameterDefinition

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseSimulateRequest.JsonActionParameterDefinition, InvokeDynamicActionParameterDescriptor
public interface ActionParameterDefinition
A definition for a parameter that should be user-definable for an action

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    name()
    The name of the parameter as the user will set it.
    boolean
    required()
    Whether this parameter is required or not.
    void
    store(Renderer renderer, int actionLocal, Consumer<Renderer> loadParameter)
    A procedure to write the bytecode to set the parameter in the action instance
    Imyhat
    type()
    The type of the parameter

  • Method Details

    • name

      String name()
      The name of the parameter as the user will set it.
      Returns:
      the Shesmu identifier for the parameter

    • required

      boolean required()
      Whether this parameter is required or not.

      If not required, the user may omit setting the values.

      Returns:
      true if the parameter is required; false if it can be omitted

    • store

      void store(Renderer renderer, int actionLocal, Consumer<Renderer> loadParameter)
      A procedure to write the bytecode to set the parameter in the action instance
      Parameters:
      renderer - The method where the code is being generated
      actionLocal - The local variable holding the action being populated
      loadParameter - a callback to load the desired value for the parameter; it should be called exactly once.

    • type

      Imyhat type()
      The type of the parameter
      Returns:
      the Shesmu type for the parameter
